title: The Courageous Chronicles of Alice Cook: Tutor by Day, Hero by Night
summary: Over a week, Alice Cook, a 21-year-old tutor with a passion for helping others, discovers her supernatural ability to manipulate time during her tutoring and training sessions. She uses these powers to thwart a local crime spree, while maintaining her daily responsibilities.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche entdeckt Alice Cook, eine 21-jährige Tutorin mit einer Leidenschaft für das Helfen anderer, ihre übernatürliche Fähigkeit, während ihrer Tutoring- und Trainingssitzungen die Zeit zu manipulieren. Sie nutzt diese Kräfte, um eine lokale Verbrechenswelle zu vereiteln, während sie ihre täglichen Pflichten weiterführt.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt Alice Cook, een 21-jarige tutor met een passie voor het helpen van anderen, haar bovennatuurlijke vermogen om tijd te manipuleren tijdens haar begeleiding- en trainingssessies. Ze gebruikt deze krachten om een lokale misdaadgolf te dwarsbomen, terwijl ze haar dagelijkse verantwoordelijkheden behoudt.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, Alice Cook, une tutrice de 21 ans passionnée par l'aide aux autres, découvre sa capacité surnaturelle à manipuler le temps lors de ses séances de tutorat et d'entraînement. Elle utilise ces pouvoirs pour contrer une vague de criminalité locale, tout en maintenant ses responsabilités quotidiennes.

story.text: Alice Cook starts her week tutoring mathematics, feeling peaceful as she helps students grasp complex concepts.
During a late evening run, Alice experiences a strange sensation and accidentally reverses time by five minutes.
Alice hones her newfound abilities, using them to perfect her training regimen, ending the day feeling triumphant.
While tutoring, Alice notices a commotion nearby; she discreetly uses her powers to stop a burglary, exciting her sense of justice.
Alice feels sad grappling with the morality of using her powers secretly, but resolves to be a guardian in the shadows.
During another evening chase, Alice becomes a mysterious protector, preventing a crime spree and inspiring safety tales among locals.
Reflecting on her week, Alice feels content knowing she has made a difference while keeping her normal life intact.

ending: As the new week dawns, Alice Cook feels triumphant, committed to balancing both her lives, embodying the true spirit of a modern hero.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility; use your gifts to make a positive impact on the world.
